name: Atermon
description:
Our hero finds himself in a seemingly never-ending garden, with puzzling elements and a mysterious trapdoor. Can he escape the loop he's found himself in?

Made for Ludum Dare 47 (Theme: Stuck in a loop)

---CREDITS---
Lead Programmer: Aimilios Seimenis
Game & Level Design: Nicolas Joukowski
Music & Sound Effects: Nikolas Platon
Assistant Programmer: Dimitris Provatas
